entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016
